subsection.name: Adding configuration support to the component
subsection.p: To be supplied with a configuration, our component must implement the Avalon Framework Configurable interface. The following code is the HelloComponent extended to include implementation of Configurable, and updates to the inialize method to log the source of the configuration based on runtime information.
